summary.span: 提供所有 物件的基底類別，這些物件可用於呈現 ASP.NET Mobile 控制項。

span.span: Provides the base class for all objects used for rendering ASP.NET mobile controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別和其繼承的類別提供服務和配接器執行轉譯的 helper 方法。The class and its inherited classes provide services and helper methods for adapters to perform rendering.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 頁面配置器必須呼叫這個方法，然後才轉譯頁面上，但之後呼叫方法。The page adapter must call this method before rendering the page, but after calling the method. 如果引發例外狀況方法會呼叫超過一次。An exception is raised if the method is called more than once.

Public Overridable Sub WriteEncodedUrl (url As String)
public: virtual void WriteEncodedUrl(System::String ^ url);
abstract member WriteEncodedUrl : string -> unit override this.WriteEncodedUrl : string -> unit

param.name: url
param.span: URL 字串。

span.span: The URL string.

summary.span: 寫入指定的 URL，針對目標裝置予以正確編碼。

span.span: Writes the given URL, encoding it correctly for the target device.

summary.span: URL 可能包含參數。

span.span: The URL might include parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URL 會轉譯根據 URL 編碼的規格。The URL is translated in accordance with the specification for URL encoding. 比方說，URL 的主要部分中的空格會轉譯成 %20、 URL 參數部分中的空格會轉譯為加號 （+）、 '/' 字元轉譯為 %2f 等等。For example, spaces in the main part of the URL are translated into %20, spaces in the parameter part of the URL are translated into plus (+) signs, the '/' character is translated into %2f, and so forth. 衍生寫入器類別可以覆寫這個方法。Derived writer classes can override this method.

related.span: 調整控制項行為的架構概觀

span.span: Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior

related.span: 配接器集的功能

span.span: Adapter Sets Functionality

summary.span: 寫入指定的 URL 參數文字，針對目標裝置予以正確編碼。

span.span: Writes the given URL parameter text, encoding it correctly for the target device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承的寫入器類別可以覆寫這個方法。Inherited writer classes can override this method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void WriteUrlEncodedString (string s, bool argument);
.method familyhidebysig instance void WriteUrlEncodedString(string s, bool argument) cil managed
Protected Sub WriteUrlEncodedString (s As String, argument As Boolean)
protected: void WriteUrlEncodedString(System::String ^ s, bool argument);
member this.WriteUrlEncodedString : string * bool -> unit

param.name: s
param.span: 要加入的字串。

span.span: The string to be added.

param.name: argument
param.span: 如果引數為 ，會將字串當做 URL 參數的一部分來完成編碼。

span.span: If argument is , the encoding is done as if the string were a part of the URL parameters.

param.span: 如果引數為 ，會將字串當做 URL 路徑部分的一部分完成編碼。

span.span: If argument is , the encoding is done as if the string were part of the path portion of the URL.

summary.span: 寫入指定的字串，並根據 URL 需求編碼此字串。

span.span: Writes the given string, encoding it according to URL requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法會使用這個方法作為公用程式方法。The and methods use this method as a utility method.
